No soy mucho de puzzle, la verdad no me gustan mucho los juegos con esa dinamica, pero este juego logro divertirme, aunque por momentos me irrite un poco por no saber como resolver un nivel, logre completarlo, y diria que para mi es un 7.9/10, mas por que no me gusta mucho estos juegos puzzles, pero el final de este juego es hermoso, te hace sentir que todo lo angustiante de esos niveles es rentable, me gusto el juego 7.9/10 pero el final los ultimos 40 minutos 10/10,

Wow. This game is amazing. I have it on my XBox, but bought it on here too, so I could use the editor. Even without adding BEEMOD to the editor, there are still endless chambers that you could create. If there was one thing I would complain about, i t is that there is no Portal 3! 10/10, 5 stars, all that jazz. This game is truly a work of art.

[h1] INNECESARIO PERO VALEN LA PENA LOS MODS Y MAPAS DE LA COMUNIDAD [/h1]

Lo que debiÃ³  ser una precuela termino siendo una secuela, totalmente innecesaria (hasta le cambiaron el final a la primera parte para hacer esta), e inlcuso cada dos por tres te dejan referencias  a cosas del pasado (que a nuestra pj ni le deberÃ­an interesar) [spoiler] hasta te mandan al aperture antiguo [/spoiler] pero no tienen los huevos de hacer el juego EN EL PASADO COMO DEBERÃA SER, eligieron repetir la misma formula [strike] agregandole 3 aparatitos o mecÃ¡nicas mÃ¡s y une escenario mÃ¡s bonito. [/strike] 
 [b] Recomiendo el mod: "Portal stories: Mel" y explorar otros mods hechos por la comunidad que hacen al juego realmente valer la pena y tienen historias incluso mÃ¡s interesantes que contar sumandole al titulo mÃ¡s tiempo de juego y explorando mÃ¡s mecÃ¡nicas y de mejor manera[/b].
Resumen: La historia por si misma no vale la pena pero el agregado de los mods, mapas de la comunidad y el coop hacen que lo recomiende. No tengas expectativas muy altas y compralo en rebajas si no estas apurado para completar la historia
Far better than the original. Dialogue is hilarious and puzzles are interesting but not very hard. Really cool concept executed perfectly. Would recommend this game to everyone.
i am smart so its easy, IQ 200, beat in 3 minutes.

Overall, portal 2 a great game.

Puzzles: They are easy enough so you don't have to look up guides, yet hard enough that it'll take some time to solve. There was only one time I needed to look up an online walkthrough, and it was later in the game ( no spoilers C: )

Humor: The humor in Portal 2 is the best it's ever been, funny to give many laughs but not to the point where it's annoying. I've had many laughs in this game, usually right after a stressful puzzle which was good.

Gameplay: Expect to spend around 4-7 hours playing the main story. It isn't hard to complete but it might take some time just thinking about what to do and how to solve. The environment changes throughout the story, expect to spend no more than 1-2 hours in each section. There are also many fun easter eggs throughout, so prepare to look for those. Also, after you finish the main story you can play co-op with friends or play community creations made in the steam workshop.

Conclusion: Portal 2 is a fun and challenging game, that integrates humor into a well-written story flawlessly. If you want a fun game to play in your free time, this is the game for you.
Excelente juego se recomienda para toda la familia.

The single player campaign is by far not as good as Portal 1.
But the coop modus is great.
Buy it for the coop experience. Play it with a friend. Have a blast.

I've owned Portal 2 on multiple consoles, and now I've purchased it for PC (truly, the superior offering). The game is near-perfect. Perpetual Testing Initiative manages to make it even better. With it, one can now test for years and years to come - for science!

Top Spiel mit einer Top Story! Portal 1 fand ich schon super doch Portal 2 setzt noch einmal einen drauf! Auch von der Spielzeit her ist es 2-3 fach so lange wie Portal 1. Auch der Humor des Spiels finde ich super da es trotzdem noch ernst bleibt. Habt ihr es noch nicht gespielt mÃ¼sst ihr es unbedingt nachholen.

Was mich aber ein wenig stÃ¶rte war, das dieses Spiel nach einer gewissen Spielzeit gerne mal abstÃ¼rzt. Gut das Portal 2 so gute Checkpoints hat. Ich mÃ¶chte aber anmerken das es nicht am Spiel sondern vielleicht auch an meinem PC liegen kann was mich jedoch wundern wÃ¼rde da die Half-Half reihe und Portal 1 reibungslos liefen.

A must buy for co op
yes very good robot make portal gun go brrrrrrr
Awesome game! Played this when I was younger and I still love it! Wish they would make a 3rd game.
Another great job done by Valve. It's a great game that allows you to torture your friends while solving puzzles that are simple as hell.

1. Being good at Portal 2 allows you to flex on your enemies with your superior problem solving skills.
2 The setting of the game - Aperture Science - is absolutely awesome. The few cinematic shots you get of the whole place blows your mind; I guarantee you that there is no human mind strong enough to comprehend it all- if a model of it even exists.
3. The characters and their humor are just the best.

One of my favorite game of all time and definitely deserves its critical acclaimed status. The games pace is splendid, the games narration is one of a kind, just as great as the first and the different emotions you feel during gameplay is hard to explain, I could replay this game over and over again and never be bored due to the different ways you can complete a test chamber. By far one of the most important games in gaming history along with its predecessor.

La mecÃ¡nica de los portales es Ãºnica, el usar los portales como mÃ©todo para hacer los diferentes rompecabezas que presenta el juego. Aparte, Portal 2 tienes modo para dos jugadores y otro donde puedes crear tus propios puzzles y publicarlos para que la gente lo juegue. Es un juego muy completo y divertido, una de las mejores secuelas para un videojuego.
